snippet.title: Disney, Pixar, Official Cars Race O Rama HD video game trailer PS3 Xbox Nintendo Wii and DS
snippet.description:
http://www.gamezplay.org - Lightning McQueen is back with brand spanking-new looks and amazing drifting abilities that give him the edge to compete in his most challenging race yet. Cars Race-O-Rama immerses players into a racing adventure through unique locales never before seen in the world of Cars. From sandy beaches, to metro cities, and even to vast deserts, players will race with their own customized Lightning and compete against the best of the best all over the continent for a chance to win the Race-O-Rama trophy.
Features:

    * Customization Option-Customize the racing world by modifying cars with paint colour, wheels and rimes, different hood options, side skirts, rear bumpers and spoilers.
    * Playable Characters- There are more than 30 playable characters, 12 of which are brand new: Doc Hudson, Chick Hicks, Motor Co, Not Chuck Tater, Tater Jr., Bubba, Vin Racer, along with major boss characters who are Chick Hicks protégés (El Machismo, Candice and Stinger).
    * Brand New Worlds  Experience eight racing environments, four of which are completely brand new: Radiator Springs Speedway, Santa Carburera, Motoropolis City and Autovia.
    * Play With a Friend- Experience the fun and race against a friend in Arcade Mode, which consists of mini games, lap races, missions and more.
    * Dynamic Game Events- Experience the paparazzi react or the crowds go wild as certain stunts are performed.
    * Advanced Competitive Al System- Stay on top of the game as other characters employ cheat mechanisms to get other racers to lose the game.
    * New and Improved Drifting- Take control of Lightning and experience racing in a whole new way by employing newly designed drifting abilities throughout various races.
    * New Mini-Games- Experience 10 new mini-games: Mack Track Challenge, based on Mattels new toy; El Materdor, Mater the Great and Tokyo Mater, all of which are based on the Disneys Cars Toons episodes ; plus many new original games, such as Photo Op, Auto Cross, Tractor Stampeded, Tire Find, Sheriffs Chase and Transporter.
